00018 #ifndef TLM_DATA_SERIALIZERS_HEADER
00019 #define TLM_DATA_SERIALIZERS_HEADER
00020 
00021 #include "tlm_helpers.h"
00022 
00023 //
00024 // Copy from/to a byte array in host endianness
00025 //
00026 
00027 //
00028 // serialisation helper functions 
00029 // for standard SystemC data types : sc_int<W>, sc_uint<W>, sc_bigint<W>, sc_biguint<W>
00030 // for these, the index is not in bytes but in units of W (bit lenght)
00031 // (number of bytes read from the array is rounded to W/8)
00032 //
00033 template< class T >
00034 inline void copy_from_array( T& data, unsigned int index, unsigned char* m_data)
00035 {
00036   const int nr_bytes = data.length() / 8;
00037 
00038   if (hostHasLittleEndianness()) {
00039     for(int b = 0; b < nr_bytes; ++b) {
00040       data.range(b*8+7, b*8) = sc_uint<8>(m_data[nr_bytes*index + b]); 
00041     }
00042 
00043   } else {
00044     for(int b = 0; b < nr_bytes; ++b) {
00045       data.range(b*8+7, b*8) = sc_uint<8>(m_data[nr_bytes*index + (nr_bytes - b - 1)]); 
00046     }
00047   }
00048 }
00049 
00050 template< class T >
00051 inline void copy_to_array( const T& data, unsigned int index, unsigned char* m_data)
00052 {
00053   const int nr_bytes = data.length() / 8;
00054 
00055   if (hostHasLittleEndianness()) {
00056     for(int b = 0; b < nr_bytes; ++b) {
00057       m_data[nr_bytes*index + b] = sc_uint<8>(data.range(b*8+7,b*8));
00058     }
00059 
00060   } else {
00061     for(int b = 0; b < nr_bytes; ++b) {
00062       m_data[nr_bytes*index + (nr_bytes - b - 1)] = sc_uint<8>(data.range(b*8+7,b*8));
00063     }
00064   }
00065 }
00066 
00067 
00068 //
00069 // serialisation helper functions 
00070 // for standard C++ data types (up to 64 bits): char, short, int, long, long long
00071 // for these, the index is not in bytes but in units of sizeof(T)
00072 //
00073 #define TLM_COPY_FROM_ARRAY( otype )  \
00074   template<> inline \
00075   void copy_from_array( otype& data, unsigned int index, unsigned char* m_data) \
00076   { \
00077     data = reinterpret_cast<otype*>(m_data)[index]; \
00078   }
00079 
00080 #define TLM_COPY_TO_ARRAY( otype ) \
00081   template<> inline \
00082   void copy_to_array( const otype& data, unsigned int index, unsigned char* m_data) \
00083   { \
00084     reinterpret_cast<otype*>(m_data)[index] = data; \
00085   }
00086 
00087 TLM_COPY_FROM_ARRAY( signed char );
00088 TLM_COPY_FROM_ARRAY( signed short );
00089 TLM_COPY_FROM_ARRAY( signed int );
00090 TLM_COPY_FROM_ARRAY( signed long );
00091 TLM_COPY_FROM_ARRAY( signed long long );
00092 TLM_COPY_FROM_ARRAY( unsigned char );
00093 TLM_COPY_FROM_ARRAY( unsigned short );
00094 TLM_COPY_FROM_ARRAY( unsigned int );
00095 TLM_COPY_FROM_ARRAY( unsigned long );
00096 TLM_COPY_FROM_ARRAY( unsigned long long );
00097 
00098 TLM_COPY_TO_ARRAY( signed char );
00099 TLM_COPY_TO_ARRAY( signed short );
00100 TLM_COPY_TO_ARRAY( signed int );
00101 TLM_COPY_TO_ARRAY( signed long );
00102 TLM_COPY_TO_ARRAY( signed long long );
00103 TLM_COPY_TO_ARRAY( unsigned char );
00104 TLM_COPY_TO_ARRAY( unsigned short );
00105 TLM_COPY_TO_ARRAY( unsigned int );
00106 TLM_COPY_TO_ARRAY( unsigned long );
00107 TLM_COPY_TO_ARRAY( unsigned long long );
00108    
00109 #endif /* TLM_DATA_SERIALIZERS_HEADER */
